summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the establishing of the curb grades of North 90th Street from Burke Avenue North to Meridian Avenue North and of Burke Avenue North from North 90th Street to a point approximately 20 feet south thereof; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of property, rights and privileges necesary therefor, in conformity with the grades established herein; providing for the making of the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon certain property abutting upon said street and avenue; and providing for payment.
